name: Revered Guidance
text: You were selected by your celestial ancestor to be a guide for a chosen people, and serve as a beacon of hope in times of despair.
prerequisites: Aasimar, must be taken at 1st level.
benefit: Select one of the following creature subtypes: dwarf, elf, gnome, halfling, human, or orc. You gain a +4 racial bonus on Diplomacy checks made to influence creatures of the selected subtype.
text_zh: 你被你的天界祖先选为一个天选之人的引导者，成为绝望中的希望灯塔。
prerequisites_zh: 神裔，必须在一级时选取。
benefit_zh: 选择下列生物亚种之一：矮人、精灵、侏儒、半身人、人类或兽人。你对该亚种的生物的交涉检定有+4种族加值。
